title: Learning Interest & Preferences Survey
subtitle: For Students at Ugly Duck School – Kunming, China

intro.welcome: Welcome! This survey helps us understand <bold>how you learn best</bold>, what makes you <bold>feel supported</bold>, and how we can make learning more <bold>comfortable, interesting, and fun</bold> for you.
intro.noWrongAnswers: There are <bold>no right or wrong answers</bold>. Just be yourself and answer honestly.

consent.privacy: Your answers are private and will only be used to support your learning experience.
consent.agree: I understand the purpose of this survey and agree to participate.
